level.heading: Violations.
level.text: ยง 27-3021.2. Violations. Except as otherwise provided in this chapter, any person or business who shall violate any of the provisions of this chapter or who shall fail to comply with any requirement thereof or with the electrical code technical standards or who shall violate or fail to comply with any order or rule of the commissioner made thereunder shall, for each and every violation or noncompliance be subject to penalties and other enforcement actions in accordance with the provisions of chapter 2 of title 28 of the administrative code.
